titleStmt.title: The infants advocate of circumcision on Jewish and baptisme on Christian children. By Thomas Fuller, B.D.
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Norton, for J. Williams, at the Crown in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The words "Circumcision and baptisme" and "Jewish Christian" are enclosed in brackets on the title page.
"The infants advocate. Chap. XXI." (caption title) has separate pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Crown in S. Pauls Church-yard
